Description: Vintage 1978 Gretsch TK300 model 7625 solid body electric guitar Made in the USA with some MIJ parts (pickups etc) == Some play wear, light scratches, etc. -- This guitar would be in VG+ or better condition except it has suffered damage to the clearcoat & discoloration of wood at bottom of body as shown -- mostly edge and lower back, still looks very good from the front == These have a truss rod adjustment in neck heel as shown -- I didn't have the proper tool so I had to remove neck to adjust it -- I don't think it had ever been tightened but the rod works and I took out most of the relief bow it had (I think it would adjust more if desired -- plays well now with action under 3/32" low E's on the almost short-scale 24 1/2" scale neck == Fresh 9-42 Slinky strings == And it sounds damn good -- I like it a lot! == Original hard case == Worldwide Shipping -- NOTE: International buyers NOTE: CITES as of 1 Jan. 2017 restricts all rosewoods (although most are not endangered!!) -- our guitars may have rosewood components; check with your local customs to determine if this affects shipping to your country before purchase == If you are considering a purchase, please take a minute and read our feedback !!! We strive to achieve 5 star service !! PLEASE contact us if there are ANY problems BEFORE leaving feedback !! THANKS !! Payment within 3 days please == We pack extremely well and ship quickly as possible! PLEASE NOTE: Normal handling time is 3 business days or less, but we are out of town on buying trips once or twice a month which might result in a day or so delay !! If you are not certain, ask questions !!! We describe as accurately as possible and research well but we're NOT an experts nor a techs. Check our feedback and buy with confidence !! AK& HI may be a bit more, too = check with us !! (Also, I recommend having guitars set up professionally to your liking, our tastes may vary !!) PLEASE !!!!! Be certain you can afford an item BEFORE you make a bid or offer !!! THANK YOU !!
